posts.content:
Karpathy mention a hack that I will implement, which is that as soon as you wake up, do nothing except get starlight to work; more specifically don’t fill up your kind with things that aren’t of the highest priority to the current tasks. Things like social media, messages, email, . There almost a pure state of focus that get enhanced by remaining in this out state for 2-3 hours getting closer to deep work

Regardless of what work, which we will narrow down, AI will be integral. Leveraging it for coding, integrating it into people lives and seeing how it can improve, some combination or irl and virtual.

Need to think harder on this but we should put an app on the market. Something that you can say that you did . Could be the start of something big.

For now think small, the big thing will be deviations and branches from what you do .

The ideas that I have tailored in as the initial proof of concepts are the following:
Anabolic Bro Menu app, where you scan a menu and it tells you what dishes seem like they will have the most protien and have the best potential ratio for inducing anabolism

Next is the continue side quest app that has potential but needs to be greatly refined. It almost seems like just a leveled up list app where people can add things to do in a specific place and you verify that youve been there y capture with AR the artifcat that is meant to be found in that location

The next thing that I will get going over this next 100 so days now is a blog. Where I can write all of the thoughts that I am pontificating about, as well as just a way of journaling.

The last thing which is the main reason that I am in Shanghai is the language learning, I will be diligent , dedicated and prolific with my langauge learning. My goal this semester is to be able to have a genuine conversation with the older secrty gaurd man that works the night shift in your dorm
just testing this out here. I look forward to writing more and uploading my thoughts for the wrld to see.
